description: The typical IRC options and parameters are presented. There are some extra features that are either centric to KVIrc or IRCv3+.
I was using Hexchat before but this works much better with more options. You can customizable the mask for notify on the fly and you can do ping, clientinfo and more with the click of a button.
Easy to configure, userfriendly setup, Dark theme is also great.
in order to mute joins and quits for example i have to run some stuff in the script tester but other then that this client has it all and then some
Tiene todas las opciones esperables en un cliente de Mirc, y MÁs. Muy recomendable.

Application que j'utilise depuis des années si parfois il y a eu des soucis de polices ce problème est réglé depuis la derniere version, je recommande pour celles et ceux qui ont pas peur de chercher un peu
